songs.title: I’ll Stand By You (Cover)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Lauren & All & Camila]
Oh, why you look so sad?
Tears are in your eyes, come on and come to
Me now
Don't be ashamed to cry
Let me see you through cause I've seen the
Dark side too

[Pre-Chorus: Dinah]
When the night falls on you
You don't know what to do
Nothing you confess
Could make me love you less

[Chorus: All]
I'll stand by you
I'll stand by you
Won't let nobody hurt you
I'll stand by you

[Verse 2: Normani & All & Camila]
So if you're mad, get mad
Don't hold it all inside, come on and talk to
Me now
Hey, what you got to hide?
I get angry too, well I'm a
Lot like you

[Pre-Chorus: Ally & Camila]
When you're standing at the crossroads
And don't know which path to choose
Let me come along
Cause even if you're wrong

[Chorus: All]
I'll stand by you
I'll stand by you
Won't let nobody hurt you
I'll stand by you
Take me in, into your darkest hour
And I'll never desert you
I'll stand by you
